summary: The adopted son of a legendary actor, and an aspiring star himself, turns to his infant brother's wet nurse for support and affection - only for her to give up everything for her beloved's glory.
cast: Shôtarô Hanayagi|Kôkichi Takada|Ryôtarô Kawanami|Kinnosuke Takamatsu|Jun'nosuke Hayama|Tamitaro Onoue|Ichirô Yûki|Kômei Minami|Jin'ichi Amano|Haruo Inoue|Sumao Ishihara|Kô Hirota|Minpei Tomimoto|Eijirô Hose|Nobuko Fushimi|Kikuko Hanaoka|Fujiko Shirakawa|Yoneko Mogami|Yoshie Nakagawa|Hisayo Nishi|Junko Kagami|Hisano Yamato|Haruko Tagawa|Atsuko Shibata|Fumiko Akimoto|Mitsue Kuniharu|Kimiko Shirotae|Gonjurô Kawarazaki|Kakuko Mori|Yoshiaki Hanayagi|Benkei Shiganoya|Haruko Yanagido|Makoto Matsushita|Akira Shima|Hideo Nakagawa|Kitada Hiroshi|Kiyoshi Makino|Kazuyoshi Tachibana|Akio Isono|Tokusaburo Arashi|Yôko Umemura
title: Historia de los crisantemos tardíos
